inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: chronic myalgia (>6 months) with/without accompanying arthralgia per DC/TMD

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: PSQI questionnaire (response of fairly bad or very bad sleep quality in the last month)

exclusion.criterion: Presence of any dental or orofacial pain disorder not meeting the definition
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of other pharmacological treatment for TMD or sleep during duration of the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Use of any psychotropic medication or drug known to influence sleep or pain such as amphetamines, benzodiazepines, anticonvulsants, neuroleptics, or antidepressants
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD, OSA and obesity hypoventilation syndrome, dCHF. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
